title: MrFortune2
author: MrFortune2
content: We are pleased to announce that we are selling our fully-functional and feature-rich crypto exchange website. Our platform has a wide range of functionalities including HTTPS certificate, support for 4 major cryptocurrencies, compound interest daily payouts, referral system, and a working CEX platform for spot trading.Our exchange is ready to use and includes user registration and login, email notifications, and one-month post-sale support. It is an ideal opportunity for any business or individual looking to enter the cryptocurrency exchange market.The website is well-designed and easy to navigate, and offers a comprehensive trading experience for both novice and experienced traders. Our exchange offers a secure and reliable platform.Send me a PM if interested.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: You should list it on https://codecanyon.net/category/php-scripts?term=cryptocurrency%20exchange, there are a few crypto exchange scripts there that have sold. I used to use codecanyon and themeforest in my web design work, and they get a good amount of traffic. Alternatively, if you'd be interested in setting up a website to sell this script, I'm in between web design projects right now and could get a website built pretty quickly for you to promote and sell the script.
